title: Product Catalog Eligibility
description:
Description
For an internal user
who wants to create a new mobile contract on behalf of the customer
the eligibility
Is a crucial capability in the sales process,
that refers to the suitability and availability of specific telecom services or products for businesses at a particular location or under certain conditions. It determines whether a customer can access services like fiber internet, VPN, mobile solutions, or cloud services, based on factors such as network coverage, technical requirements, or contract suitability.
Unlike todays solution like BSP or CARMEN
our solution defines which products can be offered and delivered to a customer.
